newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products supported by futures, crude climb.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products supported by futures, crude climb.

text.p: NWE oil products rose on stronger crude and futures on Friday, traders said.
Naphtha prices were steady, supported by firmer crude and gasoline futures. Gasoline edged slightly higher with crude and as NYMEX unleaded firmed around a cent a gallon.
Gas oil was firmer on the back of $1 a tonne stronger futures. Premiums were largely steady, except for easier Russians.
High sulphur barges gained as bunker demand picked up. Cargoes looked to support from material going east from the Med and low sulphur looked tight in the prompt period.
